) } const mapStateToProps = state => { console.log("id is" + state.category.id) return { id: state.category.id } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { onClicked: (name, id) => dispatch(actions.updateCategory(name, id)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(AdminAccordian);
